Thank you for all your feedback! We have improved the overall gameplay, added several new features and fixed several bugs from your suggestions. 

* Fixed dozens of bugs and improved game performance!
* Increased the time for each day.
* Game no longer resets after beating day 30. Now you can keep playing Good Pizza, Great Pizza forever!
* Updated game design and controls!
* Added new upgrades!
* Kitchen now opens full screen!
* Leaderboard and achievements added! Compete against other Good Pizza, Great Pizza players!
* iOS 10 stickers (15 stickers, animated and static)

Update now and make some pizza!
